scripts.dev:api: sam build -t sam/resources.yaml ${npm_config_profile:+--profile $npm_config_profile} ${npm_config_region:+--region $npm_config_region} && sam local start-api -t .aws-sam/build/template.yaml --parameter-overrides Stage=prod ${OPENAI_API_KEY:+OpenAIApiKey=$OPENAI_API_KEY} --env-vars sam/local-env.json --port 3001 ${npm_config_profile:+--profile $npm_config_profile} ${npm_config_region:+--region $npm_config_region}
